prompts: Create a bear-like Pokemon that has a big, round body and sharp claws.
Imagine a fierce Pokemon with brown fur and a strong personality, perfect for battles.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a giant bear, with a striking golden ring.
Show me a powerful Pokemon with massive arms and a playful demeanor, ready for adventure.
Generate an image of a bear Pokemon that thrives in forests and mountains.
Make a Pokemon with a bulky frame and a loud roar, showcasing its strength.
Give me a Pokemon that is both a cuddly bear and a fierce fighter in battles.
